title: Fixed an issue where the Help Text configuration field was limited to 50 characters instead of the intended 2000.
Fixed an issue where the custom tab text section fields was limited to 50 characters instead of the intended 2000.
Resolved an issue where new-style grids configured via. a plugin would not honor the configured sort column.
Resolved a critical bug with the integration to on-prem WellView/SiteView where the API calls to retrieve wells and jobs would fail.
